summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of various text‑processing helper functions, covering compression, lazy formatting, list extraction, filename sanitization, newline handling, phone‑to‑numeric conversion, slug creation, smart splitting, character and word truncation (including HTML), entity unescaping, string literal unescaping, and line wrapping.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the text utility library used for data cleaning, formatting, and presentation in applications, reducing bugs and improving user‑facing text handling.
